https://tmrev.io/movie/791343-DC Showcase: Kamandi: The Last Boy on Earth! 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lMXcCT8RrcIz6lrV4Q5Zg1fG2zc.jpg Kamandi and his friends Prince Tuftan of the Tiger Kingdom and humanoid mutant Ben Boxer are kidnapped by a gorilla cult dedicated to finding the reincarnation of their god, The Mighty One. Golgan, the cult’s leader, puts Kamandi’s team through a series of deadly tests to find if any of them know the secret of … The Mighty One. DC Showcase: Kamandi: The Last Boy on Earth!
